session_info.name: THYB - Invited Oral Presentation, Accelerator Technology

papers.title: Status and Trends in Magnet Power Converter Technology for Accelerators
authors: Power converters (PC) is one of the key technologies for accelerators. During recent years with the development of power semiconductor devices
the voltage and current ratings and power densities have greatly increased for PCs. Various PCs are required for various magnets in accelerators
but in principle the design for main topologies and the methodology for stabilizing the output are similar. Main topologies
digital control systemsï¼Œand considerations for the future about the magnet PC are briefly discussed in this presentation.
